amendment.description: To require the provision of certain services to veterans in the Freely Associated States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3813 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3813 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 3748. To require the provision of certain services to veterans in the Freely Associated States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3813 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
